text: Nabiyow yahuud fanat yaabaay ken fan mekel Yalli Qhuraanak kol oobiseemil, ken nafs√Æ fayxiixa makataatinaay Yalli Qhuraanak kol oobiseemik tuk koo waasaanaah kaal taniimil taamite waytaamak keenik cibbarsim, tama yahuud atu ken fanat abta meklat derre cabeeniih cineenik, toysa cagalah Yalli usun aben dambittek tul ken digaalam faxam ixig Nabiyow, diggah Sinaamak maggo mari Yallih Amri cineeh kay taaqatak yewqe mara kinnon
